name: Escape Extinction (Johan)
description:
Description:

Escape Extinction is a 2D action game that was made for the "Go Godot Jam 3".

In the game your goal is to spawn 5 members of your species and lead them to underground cave to safety, all the while a predator of the ocean is chasing you!

                                                                           

Team:

Johan

                                                                           

Engine used:

Godot Engine
